Text: Why the hell isn't there any instructions or comments on this? Is this pre-cracked? Does it come with a crack that I need to apply? What the fuck is wrong with you not putting up any info like that? Fucking imbeciles.

@Lance: Because kid, this torrent doesn't require instructions, even a 10 year old knows how to run a setup.exe hit Next, Next etc and Install. If you don't know how to do that then I'm sorry you're just dumb.

Back to topic, the torrent worked great and the game's perfectly fine! Just remember to choose English when it asks which language to install in. Enjoy everyone! I know I will!
